text: Big shout out to <@U26EWKYLC>, <@U7SL518D6> and <@UQ3DGT8VC> for helping me pilot the first episode of the HubSpot Community Developer Show!   Each one of them leveraged their expertise to help us all be more aware of accessibility on the web :orange_heart: .  Was a blast!
And thank *you* for hosting! Great work
woohoo! where can we hear or see it?
Will let you know once i get it up :slightly_smiling_face:

Thank you, <@UD53A9UUR> for including me. And props to <@UQ3DGT8VC> and <@U7SL518D6> for bringing the knowledge. Great way to kick off the show. Looking forward to watching this thing take off.

Thank you also to <@U25PYL3Q8>, <@UDEASNWEB>, <@U7V9DQ31P> and anyone else that contributed questions to guide the conversation. That will prove to be a vey cool aspect of this show structure.
